qas.question: What term in higher education refers to technical universities that award engineering degrees?
Traditionally, how many Politecnici were there?

context: In higher education, <a0_0>Politecnico<a0_0/> refers to a technical university awarding degrees in engineering. Historically there were <a1_0>two<a1_0/> Politecnici, one in each of the two largest industrial cities of the north:
